snippet: A 4-year-old boy was found in good condition today after spending a chilly night lost high in the San Bernardino Mountains....
lead_paragraph: A 4-year-old boy was found in good condition today after spending a chilly night lost high in the San Bernardino Mountains.
abstract: Four-year-old Marcelino Sanchez is found in good condition after spending night lost high in San Bernardino Mountains in California; was found three miles from site where mother and boyfriend had camped (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Lost California Boy Found in Good Condition
